timeline.message:
NXP-29705: Fixing possible thread termination of worker

The fix is in ExceptionUtils.hasInterruptedCause, just adding unit test and
improve logging here

NXP-29705: Fixing possible thread termination of worker

The fix is in ExceptionUtils.hasInterruptedCause, just adding unit test and
improve logging here

NXP-29705: fix ExceptionUtils.hasInterruptedCause

This method returns true if the cause is related to an interrupted exception,
this is useful if the interrupted flag has not been propagated in custom code.
InterruptedIOException is not an interruption, we don't want to interrupt a thread
when receiving a SocketTimeoutException.
NXP-29705: Prevent possible NPE when Work title is null
